Class BaseExchange

java.lang.Object
  com.xeiam.xchange.BaseExchange
All Implemented Interfaces:
Exchange
public abstract class BaseExchange
extends Object
implements Exchange

Abstract base class to provide the following to Exchanges:

  • Access to common methods and fields

getPollingMarketDataService

public PollingMarketDataService getPollingMarketDataService()
Description copied from interface: Exchange

A market data service typically consists of a regularly updated list of the available prices for the various symbols

This is the non-streaming (blocking) version of the service

Specified by:
getPollingMarketDataService in interface Exchange
Returns:
The exchange's market data service

getPollingTradeService

public PollingTradeService getPollingTradeService()
Description copied from interface: Exchange

An trade service typically provides access to trading functionality

Typically access is restricted by a secret API key and/or username password authentication which are usually provided in the ExchangeSpecification

Specified by:
getPollingTradeService in interface Exchange
Returns:
The exchange's polling trade service

getPollingAccountService

public PollingAccountService getPollingAccountService()
Description copied from interface: Exchange

An account service typically provides access to the user's private exchange data

Typically access is restricted by a secret API key and/or username password authentication which are usually provided in the ExchangeSpecification

Specified by:
getPollingAccountService in interface Exchange
Returns:
The exchange's polling account service

getStreamingExchangeService

public StreamingExchangeService getStreamingExchangeService(ExchangeStreamingConfiguration configuration)
Description copied from interface: Exchange

A market data service typically consists of a regularly updated list of the available prices for the various symbols

This is the streaming (non-blocking and event driven) version of the service, and requires an application to provide a suitable implementation of the listener to allow event callbacks to take place.

Specified by:
getStreamingExchangeService in interface Exchange
Parameters:
configuration - The exchange-specific configuration to be applied after creation
Returns:
The exchange's "push" market data service
